grid.sql: SELECT qryReport.*, a.nimetus::varchar(254), r.regkood::varchar(20), r.nimetus::varchar(254) AS asutus, coalesce(p.regkood,'')::varchar(20) AS parregkood, coalesce(p.nimetus,'')::varchar(254) AS parasutus FROM eelarve.eelarve_tulud($1::integer,$2::date, $3::date, $4::boolean, $5::integer, $6::integer) qryReport INNER JOIN ou.rekv r ON r.id = qryReport.rekv_id LEFT OUTER JOIN com_artikkel a ON a.kood::text = qryReport.artikkel::text LEFT OUTER JOIN ou.rekv p ON r.parentid = p.id
